verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* give \w you|strong="H3588"\w* rods, \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* every family, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* every \w chief|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* head \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* father's house, \w making|strong="H7311"\w* twelve rods; let every man's \w name|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* placed \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* rod.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* Aaron's name \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w placed|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* rod \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* every family.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* let \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* stored \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H4196"\w* meeting, \w in|strong="H4196"\w* front \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ark \w of|strong="H4196"\w* witness \w where|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H7126"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* marked \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* myself \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* buds \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*; \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w stop|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* outcries \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* chiefs \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* rods, \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* head \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H4191"\w*, \w making|strong="H3605"\w* twelve rods: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron's rod \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* put \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rods \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* witness.

\w Now|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H4872"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* witness; \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0935"\w* saw \w that|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron's rod, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rod \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H0168"\w* Levi, \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* buds, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* covered \w with|strong="H0413"\w* buds \w and|strong="H0935"\w* flowers \w and|strong="H0935"\w* fruit.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* took \w out|strong="H0413"\w* all \w the|strong="H0559"\w* rods \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w back|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* saw \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* every man took \w his|strong="H3068"\w* rod.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Moses, \w Put|strong="H3615"\w* Aaron's rod back \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ark \w of|strong="H6440"\w* witness, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H5712"\w* kept \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* sign \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* false-hearted people, \w so|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H5307"\w* \w put|strong="H3615"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* stop \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* outcries \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* death \w may|strong="H5307"\w* not \w overtake|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* did: \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* did.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Truly, destruction \w has|strong="H0834"\w* come \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*; \w an|strong="H5414"\w* evil fate \w has|strong="H0834"\w* overtaken \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w*.

\w Death|strong="H4191"\w* \w will|strong="H4191"\w* \w overtake|strong="H6113"\w* everyone \w who|strong="H5975"\w* comes \w near|strong="H5975"\w*, \w who|strong="H5975"\w* comes \w near|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* House \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* Lord: \w are|strong="H5975"\w* \w we|strong="H4191"\w* all \w to|strong="H4191"\w* come \w to|strong="H4191"\w* destruction?
